questions_and_notes: Should have a different standard name: propose toa_outgoing_longwave_flux_assuming_clear_sky_and_no_aerosol.  Need to check whether there is duplication between this variable and lwtoacsaer-Emon.
long_name: TOA Outgoing Clear-Sky, Aerosol-Free Longwave Radiation
comment: Flux corresponding to rlutcs resulting from aerosol-free call to radiation, following Ghan (ACP, 2013)
